rules_text:
When this artifact enters, scry 1.
{T}: Add one mana of any type. Put a charge counter on this artifact.
{X}{X}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Choose one. Activate only if this artifact has five charge counters on it and only as a sorcery.
• Create X 1/1 colorless Alien creature tokens.
• Draw X cards, then discard three cards.
